short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip To The Next Subtitle in a Netflix Video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you're ever impatient during long scenes without dialogue in Metflix videos, simply install this extension, select a subtitle track to follow in the extension's popup, and use this extension's keyboard shortcuts specified in the extension popup to skip to the next subtitle line, allowing you to read/watch through a Netflix video like it's a comic book.
